story.iWouldLikeTo: determine which routes are the most popular for riders
story.inOrderTo: improve the road network and the usage of physical space (curb, capacity, etc.)

standards.name: MDS-provider-trips-without-ids-only-start-end
standards.explanation: assumption: the fastest route is probably the most used route from A to B and can be derived with the use of a conventinional route planner
